transcript:
Customer: Hello

Hello
Executive: Hello Haan ji Haan ji sir Mr. Shishan baat kar rahe hain kya 700 engineering se?
Customer: Haan
Executive: Sir main Sanam Prakash baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se branch manager se
Customer: Haan bolo sir
Executive: Sir meri team se aapki baat chal rahi thi Anand and Pawan se to sir apna service band karwana chah rahe the IndiaMART pe sir
Customer: Haan
Executive: But sir theek hai sir main thank you is cheez ko main dekh raha hun but sir ab business pe maturity wali ki baat kar rahe hain na ki business nahi nikal raha IndiaMART se but sir thoda samay denge to fir business wagera bhi nikalega turant to sir business nahi nikal jata sir
Customer: Man lo ek mahina to humne diya samjho abhi man lo ki abhi do teen mahine baad main aapko bolu ki aap mujhe phone karenge nahi aapne mujhe do mahine ka bola tha samjho abhi aise hi man lo ki ek bhi grahak customer nahi aaye to abhi ye jo mera paisa hai wo to koi kaam ka nahi hai na
Executive: Samajh raha hun sir dekhiye ab sir aap aap vyapari insan ho aap business ko jyada sir samajh vyapari hun isiliye main janta hun bhai ki jo jab kahin pe apna paisa man lo ke galat jagah pe chala jaye na to turant paisa nikalna chahiye
Executive: Bilkul bilkul sir aapko wahi main samajhna chah raha hun aapko bilkul matlab ki 1% ka fayda nahi lag raha IndiaMART use karte hue bhi aapko nahi lag raha ki IndiaMART se business nikalega
Customer: Nahi nahi nikalega bhai
Executive: Achcha theek hai sir main aapki baat man leta hun main aage badha dunga lekin aap thoda sa to mujhe bataiye taki main bhi matlab ki aapka jo product line hai sir isme aapko kya lagta hai hum kaisa customer la ke denge aapko agar future mein man lijiye kabhi hum aapke layak ban paye to aisa kya karwa ke denge to aapko lagega ki business IndiaMART karwa sakta hai kaise customer la ke de sir aap
Customer: Hame dekho abhi ek bhi mujhe ek bhi lead to aayi nahi hai abhi tak man lo ki aayi hai usse mujhe samne se ki hai na to aisa hi bola ki wo to main sirf search kar raha kar raha tha aur ye aise fizul hi baatein kar rahe the sab logo samjhe
Executive: Hmm
Customer: Abhi man lo isme koi dekhta hi nahi hai aur standard koi hai hi nahi to main ye paise apne aise kyun rok ke rakhu samjhe
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm
Customer: Hmm isiliye
Executive: Achcha theek hai
Customer: Abhi ek hai ki aap mujhe ek customer standard de dijiye man lo to main ye chalo ye IndiaMART shuru rakhu abhi koi standard hai hi nahi maine char panch jan aadmi ko phone kiya hai bhai lead aayi thi sabko barabar koi achcha khasa koi bhi kisi ke bhi response nahi tha
Executive: Samajh raha hun
Customer: Samjhe
Executive: Hmm
Executive: Theek hai sir main iska na refund ke liye process karne ke aage dal deta hun theek hai sir is cheez ke liye kitne din mein refund process mein pehle sir dekhiye aaj pe agar main dalunga isko theek hai to pehle services band hongi services band hone ke baad mein aapka refund ka service to waise bhi band hi hai
Executive: Nahi sir service to abhi chal raha hai active hai sir band nahi hua na sir aap use nahi kar rahe honge lekin service active hai service
Customer: Barabar abhi
Executive: Kitna jaldi ho sakta hai utna jaldi main karwa dunga aapka bilkul main karwa deta hun hum yaar chhote aadmi hai samjhe isliye humne marketing ka aisa socha tha lekin ye IndiaMART mein marketing nahi hogi wo to baat sahi hai
Executive: To isse thoda sa aapka paisa ka deduction hoga theek hai services ka jo post hua tha isme sir aapka paisa ka na thoda deduction hoga amount ka jo refund karenge jyada amount nahi hoga sir ye matlab ki jitna apna apna apna 20 din 25 din chala hai na utne din ka aapka paisa thoda deduct hoga baki sara paisa aapko aapke account mein hi chala jayega IndiaMART jaise aapne payment kiya tha sir
Customer: Wo to koi baat nahi lekin kab tak man lo ki abhi tak aap man lo ke maine ye sir minimum sir 10 10 working day man lijiye sir 10 working day man lijiye
Customer: 10 working day matlab 10 din
Executive: Haan 10 din man lijiye sir aap
Customer: Oho koi baat nahi abhi kisi ka phone rahega to man lo main main 10 din maximum deke bol raha hun sir usse pehle bhi ja sakta hai isme kya hota hai na hum process karte hain wo bank se ho jata hai fir phone mein thoda time lagta hai isliye bol ke chal rahe main aapka jald se jald karwane ka isme try karta hun sir is cheez ko koi baat nahi aage ja ke man lo jab karwana hoga tab karwaunga lekin abhi mere koi isme koi response nahi hai isliye nahi karna hai
Executive: Bilkul sir koi dikkat nahi hai sir bilkul aapko future mein bilkul kabhi lage humse baat chahiye sir aapke layak hum log bilkul seva mein hazir honge theek hai sir
Customer: Haan theek hai sir main aapko karwa karke na iska inform karwata hun sir ji
Executive: Okay theek hai okay
Customer: Haan
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to discontinue IndiaMART service.

- No business generated through IndiaMART.

- No standard leads or customer response.



Resolution:

- Agreed to process the refund request.

- Explained deduction for services used.

- Informed about 10 working days for refund.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will inform after processing refund.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, buyleads, customer service
